title: 2x1 Apartment for Rent in Downtown Fremont
posting_body: ["At Lakeview, you're conveniently close to major shopping centers and transportation.", 'A Bay Area Rapid Transit (BART) station is within a short driving distance, and a large regional shopping complex, The Hub, is located just across the street.', 'Our beautiful landscaping and many amenities offered make Lakeview Apartments a wonderful community to call home!', 'We also encourage you to stop by for a SELF GUIDED tour of our GROUNDS to get a better look at what Lakeview has to offer.', 'Upon request, pre-recorded video tours, LIVE Zoom tours and in person tours are also available.', 'Application Fee: $40 per Adult', 'Holding Deposit: $700', 'Leasing Options: 6 month lease - $2495 per month or 12 month lease - $2395 per month', 'Utilities: Not included', 'Office Location:', 'Lakeview Apartments', '4205 Mowry Avenue, Fremont CA 94538.', 'Please contact us at', 'show contact info', 'or', 'show contact info', 'or', 'Visit our website at <URL>', 'Photos in our ad may not be of the actual apartment; however, we do our best to choose photos that best resemble the unit and floor plan we have available.', 'Feel free to call us if you have questions about the photos in our ad.', '------------------------------------------------------', 'We currently have the following units:', 'Unit Details: #168', 'Size: 2 bed / 1 bath (second floor unit)', 'Available Date: September 17, 2022', 'Unit Details: #80', 'Size: 2 bed / 1 bath (second floor unit)', 'Available Date: September 17, 2022', 'Unit Amenities:', '- All Electric Kitchen', '- Dishwasher', '- Refrigerator', '- Electric Stove', '- Granite Countertops', '- Carpeted Floors', '- Private Balconies or Patios', '- Spacious Closet(s)', '- Vertical Blinds', '- Covered Parking:', 'One Assigned Space', '- Cable-Ready', 'Community Amenities:', '- Sparkling Swimming Pool', '- Beautiful ponds with exotic fish', '- Recreational Lounge', '- Hi-Tech Fitness Center', '- 24-Hour On-Call Maintenance', '- ON SITE Laundry Facility', 'only', 'To get to know Lakeview apartments better, feel free to check out our community on Facebook and Instagram.', '<URL>', '<URL>', 'Come check us out and see why Lakeview Apartments is the ideal place to call home.', 'Looking forward to hearing from you!', 'Lakeview Apartments']
